short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This product is a chrome extension that enables a user to shop online, and have proces adjusted according to wage inequality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the United States, women only earn 79 cents to every manâ€™s dollar. Since women are making less, that means everyday purchases end up costing them more. This Chrome Browser Extension illustrates this issue. As you shop online, you can use this extension to adjust the prices of products based on the earnings of a particular race and gender. 

Experience the gap, be the change.
